Albania: The Socialist Party starts a civil disobedience campaign against the government, asking for a new count of votes, and including hunger strike of opposition leaders
Economy minister Dritan Prifti resigns after being involved in a corruption scandal.
The opposition Socialist Party again walks out of the Parliament

The European Union rejects Albania's request for EU candidate status, but visa are liberalized. The ongoing political crisis was one of the reason of the refusal of granting Albania official candidacy status
